title: 1973 Project VW Splitscreen Bus For Sale - 15 Windows - Blue Deluxe - £6.9k

posts.content:
This is ready for immediate delivery. It’s in the UK, sold with NOVA clearance.

A 1973 original "T1 Brasil" deluxe model.

It is being sold as a project bus, it does require some work to bring it back to life, bodywork is in relatively good shape, some panels need replacing but these are widely available,

All the known problems are listed bellow:

    Inner and outer sills rotten
    2 x main cross members rotten
    Outriggers and jacking points rotten or missing
    Front right hand side corner panel rotten
    Both rear corner panels rotten
    Main load area floor rotten
    Both battery trays rotten
    Left hand main chassis rail broken at rear
    Right hand main chassis rail cracked at front
    Rear suspension cover plate rotten
    New Rear nearside brake required
    Small dent in the roof

Asking Price:

£6,950 as it is

or

£16,000 partial restoration, one year MOT and DVLA registered in your name (lead time is around 90 days)

or

£22,000 full restoration, one year MOT and DVLA registered in your name (lead time is around 180 days)

We are based in South London, Viewings welcome.

Call us for more information. Thank you!




More images and info in the link bellow:

http://anotherclassiccamper.com/for_sale/volkswagen-type-2-splitscreen-project-1973/

Alternatively, I can deliver this bus with all major repairs done, rewired, resprayed (inside out) in your choice of colour, one year MOT, and registered with the DVLA for 14k.

Lead time 45 days.
